val date_conform = udf((date: String) => {
     val datepart = date.split("/")     
     java.sql.Date.valueOf(Array(datepart(2),datepart(0),datepart(1)).mkString("-")) 
  }) 

val diamonds = sqlContext.read.format("csv")
  .option("header", "true")
  .option("inferSchema", "true")
  .load("gs://" + projectId + "/reference/FRED-MD/2017-03.csv")
  
  
  //val dia = diamonds.withColumn("sasdate", date_conform($"sasdate"))  
  val dia1 = diamonds //.filter("sasdate is not null")
  dia1.show
  dia1.count

sqlContext.setBigQueryProjectId(projectId)
sqlContext.setBigQueryGcsBucket(bucket)
val sampletable = sqlContext.bigQueryTable("mortgage-data-warehouse:GNMAI.GNMAI_H")   //("bigquery-public-data:samples.shakespeare")
sampletable.take(3)
sampletable.saveAsBigQueryTable("mortgage-data-warehouse:GNMAI.gnmatest")  //save doesnt' work

import spark.implicits._
import org.apache.spark.sql.types._
import org.apache.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.Row;
import com.spotify.spark.bigquery._


val csvData = """|userid,organizationid,userfirstname,usermiddlename,userlastname,usertitle,createdate
|1,1,user1,m1,l1,mr,1999-08-01
|2,2,user2,m2,l2,mr,1999-09-01
|3,3,user3,m3,l3,mr,1999-02-01
|""".stripMargin
val rdd = sc.parallelize(csvData.lines.toList)

val rddheader = rdd.first()

val rdd2 = rdd.filter(x => !x.contains("id"))

//val rdd3 = rdd.mapPartitionsWithIndex { (idx, iter) => if (idx == 1) iter.drop(1) else iter }

val row_rdd = rdd2.map(x => "tt" +: x.split(',')).map(x => Row.fromSeq(x))

val df_schema =
  StructType(
    ("ttype" +: rdd.first.split(',')).map(fieldName => fieldName match {
      case "createdate" => StructField(fieldName, StringType, true)
      case     _  => StructField(fieldName, StringType, true)
      
    }
  )
 )     


 println("-----------------check ----------------------")
  import com.google.api.services.bigquery.model.TableSchema
  import com.google.api.services.bigquery.model.TableFieldSchema

   val bq_schema = rdd.first.split(',').toList  //.map{fieldName => new TableFieldSchema().setName(fieldName).setType("String").setMode("NULLABLE")} //




var df = sqlContext.createDataFrame(row_rdd, df_schema)
df.printSchema
df.take(3)

df.columns


df.selectExpr("(usertitle, userlastname) as complex", "*").show


val dft = df.withColumn("userid", df.col("userid").cast(FloatType)) //.withColumn("createdate", df.col("createdate").cast("Date"))
dft.printSchema

//dft.saveAsBigQueryTable("mortgage-data-warehouse:FREDMD.test1")



dft.toJSON.show(false)

val df2 = df.withColumn("createdate2", 'createdate.cast("Date"))   //.select('createdate2 as 'cdate, 'userid)



df2.describe().show()

import org.apache.spark.sql.functions.{initcap}
df2.select(initcap(col("userfirstname"))).show(2, false)


val filt = col("createdate2") > java.sql.Date.valueOf("1999-08-01")

df2.where(filt).show


df2.printSchema

val df3 = df.select(
   df.columns.map {
     case "createdate" => df("createdate").cast(DateType).as("createdate")
     case "usertitle" => functions.upper(df("usertitle")).as("usertitle")
     case other         => df(other)
   }: _*
)

df3.printSchema

df3.show

val date1 = java.sql.Date.valueOf("2001-03-3")
val datepart = "02/22/2017".split("/")
val date2 = java.sql.Date.valueOf(Array(datepart(2),datepart(0),datepart(1)).mkString("-"))

val str = lit("2016-20-29")

val dateDF = spark.range(10)
  .withColumn("today", current_date())
  .withColumn("now", current_timestamp())

dateDF.createOrReplaceTempView("dateTable")
dateDF.show(false)


dateDF
  .withColumn("week_ago", date_sub(col("today"), 7))
  .select(datediff(col("week_ago"), col("today")))
  .show(1)

dateDF
  .select(
    to_date(lit("2016-01-01")).alias("start"),
    to_date(lit("2017-05-22")).alias("end"))
  .select(months_between(col("start"), col("end")))
  .show(1)
